extension.description: EightyOne er en emulator til rækken af hjemmecomputere lavet af Sinclair Research (og deres kloner) i 1980'erne.
EightyOne is an emulator for the range of home computers made by Sinclair Research (and their clones) in the 1980s.
EightyOne è un emulatore per la gamma di home computer realizzati da Sinclair Research (e relativi cloni) negli anni '80.
EightyOne 是辛克莱研究公司（Sinclair Research）在20世纪80年代制造的系列家用电脑的仿真器。
